diff_hunk:
@@ -272,12 +262,10 @@
   self: std::get<0>(gesv(grad, A.t()))
   A: -at::mm(std::get<0>(gesv(grad, A.t())), solution.t())
 
-# get_device
-
-- name: gt(Tensor self, Scalar other)
+- name: gt_(Tensor self, Scalar other)
   self: zeros_like(self)
 
-- name: gt(Tensor self, Tensor other)
+- name: gt_(Tensor self, Tensor other)
body: Out-of-place `gt` automatically doesn't require grad because the return value is an IndexTensor. However, in-place `gt_` will return a `FloatTensor` if the input is a `FloatTensor`.
body_html: Out-of-place gt automatically doesn't require grad because the return value is an IndexTensor. However, in-place gt_ will return a FloatTensor if the input is a FloatTensor.
body_text: Out-of-place gt automatically doesn't require grad because the return value is an IndexTensor. However, in-place gt_ will return a FloatTensor if the input is a FloatTensor.
